name: SpaceShips (Israax)
description:
Discover a new take on the classic retro game Asteroid !

One player is a small spaceship, lost in the realm of deep space, when suddenly, he is ambushed by an alien gravity cannon controlled by the other player, whose launching asteroids at him!

Will the spaceship manage to dodge all asteroids and survive, or will he be crushed to pieces by the alien? Discover it by playing SpaceShips!

(SpaceShip can also be used to resolve any conflict between two people, but the developer doesn't take responsibility in any resulting consequences.)

How to play : 

  • Spaceship : use z/q/d to move, space to shoot, and shift to hyperspace.
  • Alien Cannon : use left/right arrow to move, up/down to choose asteroid, and enter to shoot.
  • If the spaceship is hit by an asteroid, he lost a life. If he lose all is four lifes, the asteroids win the game !
  • If the spaceship manage to survive until the timer goes of, he win !
